name: Castle (itch) (Ruth Campbell)
description:
You play as Beatrice 'Bea' Ophider, self proclaimed explorer extraordinaire! 

Who came across a long-abandoned kingdom, whilst exploring you jump over a wall, get injured and stuck in the grounds of a castle. In order to escape you must explore the castle and follow the path of a princess who also escaped the castle long ago, allowing you to escape a similar way. 

Whilst exploring you have the chance to learn more about this new kingdom, the princess herself, and why the kingdom was originally abandoned so long ago. 

---------------

A short walking sim style game for a university project.

The player is encouraged to explore, but the open style of gameplay allows for the player to do so at their own pace. 

My focus was on level and narrative design, the third person character was a mistake I realised too late to fix.

Both castle and character modular kits were from the unreal marketplace, and audio was sourced from YouTube.
